channel.title: Cannot find Java. -Am a newbie-
channel.description: So i've gotten really tired of looking around so i just decided to post it instead....Even though i know there is probably like 20 posts about this problem. So i'm trying to create an rsps for my first time and i don't have much to refer to except the tut...So when i run the source it just says the usually blabla "somebodys source, first made have fun etc." then it just stays there...Idk if its suppose to or not but then i try to connect the client to it. No luck. So i decided to try to compile and see if anything was wrong and i get "could not find path specific" or whatever....I tried changing my variables like 6 times and nothing....Help a noob pl0x? :(

item.title: Cannot find Java. -Am a newbie-
item.dc:creator: @harlan45 harlan45
item.description:
@harlan45 wrote:

Now…
javac: file not found: *.java
Usage: javac
use -help for a list of possible options
Press any key to continue…

Should i change the name to simple complier.bat…?

Read full topic

item.title: Cannot find Java. -Am a newbie-
item.dc:creator: @Fridder Fridder
item.description:
@Fridder wrote:

@echo off
title Simple Compiler
“C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jdk1.7.0\bin\javac.exe” -cp . *.java
pause

Read full topic

item.title: Cannot find Java. -Am a newbie-
item.dc:creator: @Fridder Fridder
item.description:
@Fridder wrote:

@echo off
color 0a
title project godz hell V5
“C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jdk1.7.0\bin\java.exe” -Xmx512m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.08-ga-bin.jar server
pause

Replace your run with that.

Read full topic

item.title: Cannot find Java. -Am a newbie-
item.dc:creator: @harlan45 harlan45
item.description:
@harlan45 wrote:

JDK1.7.0 C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jdk1.7.0\bin <- if that helps at all?
32-bit Windows 7.
There is more than 1 run…
@echo off
color 0a
title project godz hell V5
java -Xmx512m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.08-ga-bin.jar server

@echo off
color 0a
title project godz hell V5
java -Xmx512m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.08-ga-bin.jar server

Exact same…just noticed. soz mega noob here
